name: Dice Knight: Reckoning of the Blood Dragon
name_original: Dice Knight: Reckoning of the Blood Dragon
description:
Dice Knight: Reckoning of the Blood Dragon is a game where you play as the dice, parkouring through a Dungeons and Dragons session, progressing through a basement, a library, a barracks, and finally coming to the dragons nest, where you fight the Blood Dragon. There are puzzle elements, combat elements, and platforming elements, all from a dice. well at least that was supposed to do
